introduction: As an experienced developer, author, and trainer in mobility and web technologies, I’ve been an active participant in developer communities since my time as a Microsoft Student Partner.
I’m passionate about development and training, and I’ve consistently met customer needs by using the latest technologies.
My experiences with start-ups, SMEs, and digital service companies (ESN / IT) have reinforced my technology choices, particularly those focused on the future.
industries: I’m mobile across Europe for training purposes.
I’ve applied my skills in various sectors including:
recentProjects: At TRIGO, I enhanced logistics software systems using advanced .NET development, Vue, and Azure.
At Active Assurances, I led a team to improve internal processes and develop new insurance software from scratch.
These experiences honed my leadership skills and deepened my technical expertise.
personalAttributes: I’m curious, versatile, and quick to get excited about new ideas and projects. I value knowledge and have a knack for understanding and explaining complex concepts easily. I’m comfortable in positions where my analytical and design skills are highlighted. Although calmer than other extroverted types, I still require a minimum level of social interaction to maintain my energy.
